name: ValidateMe
0:
”Alexa, open Validate Me”
”Cheer me up”
”Alexa, ask validate me to make my day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: validate me
des: Are you feeling down? Do you need someone to tell you that you're an amazing person? Have Alexa validate you! This skill is very easy to use with no account or hardware requirements needed. Simply ask Alexa to cheer you up, and she'll do just that for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
